@crossbrowser Scenario Outline: NHS job Search with preferences in multiple browsers # src/test/resources/Features/jobsearch.feature:15 Accepted Cookies Given I open the NHS job search page on "chrome" # stepdefinitions.NHSJobSearchSteps.openNhsJobSearch(java.lang.String) When I put my preferences "Nurse" and "London" into the Search functionality # stepdefinitions.NHSJobSearchSteps.putPreferences(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Result title displayed: Nurse jobs in London - NHS Jobs Search result: 932 jobs found for Nurse in London Axe
